headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Double Rewards in Casino Story Missions
content: For helping Tao Cheng fight off the aggressive advances of petro-magnate Avery Duggan and keeping The Diamond safe from harm this week, you'll earn double the usual rewards on all Casino Story Missions. Completing these missions as host will unlock the Security Intel Prep for the Casino Heist, giving you a helping hand as you bleed the place dry.
